  • Constructor Details

    • Etudiant

      public Etudiant(String nom, String[] matiere, double[] coeff, int nbNotes)
      Constructor for the Etudiant class.
      Parameters:
      nom - The name of the student.
      matiere - The array of subject names.
      coeff - The array of coefficients corresponding to each subject.
      nbNotes - The number of notes to be stored for each subject.

  • Method Details

      Sets the name of the student.
      Parameters:

    • getUneNote

      public double getUneNote(int indiceMatiere, int indiceNote)
      Gets a specific note for a subject.
      Parameters:
      indiceMatiere - The index of the subject.
      indiceNote - The index of the note.
      Returns:
      double The requested note.

    • meilleurNote

      public String meilleurNote()
      Gets the subject with the highest grade and the corresponding grade.
      Returns:
      String The subject with the highest grade and the grade itself.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a string representation of the student's information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String The string representation of the student.

    • initialisation

      private void initialisation()
      Initializes the 'bulletin' array with random values between 0 (inclusive) and 20 (exclusive). The 'bulletin' array represents the report of each note for the student in different subjects. This method is typically called during the construction of an Etudiant object.

    • moyenneMatiere

      public double moyenneMatiere(int indiceMatiere)
      Calculates and returns the average of the notes for a specific subject.
      Parameters:
      indiceMatiere - The index of the subject for which the average is calculated.
      Returns:
      double The average note for the specified subject. If the index is invalid (less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of subjects), an error message is printed, and the method returns 0.

    • moyenneGenerale

      public double moyenneGenerale()
      Calculates and returns the overall average for the student based on weighted averages of individual subjects.
      Returns:
      double The overall average of the student's grades. If the student has not been graded in any subject, an error message is printed, and the method returns 0.

    • bulletinEtudiant

      public void bulletinEtudiant()
      Prints the student's bulletin, including the average grades for each subject and the overall average. The information is displayed in the console.
